title: Algeria
body: The Hilton Alger has 412 rooms, including 40 deluxe suites

title: Argentina
body: The Anselmo Buenos Aires, Curio Collection by Hilton joined the Hilton family in 2015

title: Aruba
body: The Hilton Aruba spans 15 acres of beach

title: Australia
body: Guests can get up close and personal with massive saltwater crocodiles at the exciting Crocosaurus Cove near the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Darwin

title: Austria
body: Surrounded by the majestic Tyrolean Alps, Hilton Innsbruck is adjacent to the country's largest casino

title: Azerbaijan
body: Hilton Baku is located just a short walk along the Caspian Sea Boulevard to the famous 12th-century city walls of Icheri Sheher

title: Bahamas
body: British Colonial Hilton Nassau is located on the only private beach in Nassau, on the site of the Old Fort of Nassau

title: Barbados
body: Hilton Barbados Resort's grounds are home to Charles Fort, erected in 1650 by the British military to protect Carlisle Bay from enemy attacks

title: Belarus
body: Hampton by Hilton Minsk City Centre is the first internationally-branded hotel to open in the mid-scale sector in Belarus

title: Belgium
body: Hilton Antwerp Old Town's facade dates back to 1864, when the building housed the Grand Bazar Shopping Mall

title: Bolivia
body: Hampton Inn by Hilton Santa Cruz/Equipetrol is Hilton's first property in Bolivia

title: Brazil
body: Hilton Sao Paulo Morumbi's Canvas Bar & Restaurant is themed like an artist's studio, with art hanging from the high ceilings of the dramatic restaurant

title: Bulgaria
body: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Varna - Golden Sands is located in the ancient and protected forest of Golden Sands Natural Park and overlooks the Black Sea coast

title: Cameroon
body: Hilton Yaounde is the only international hotel in Cameroon's capital

title: Canada
body: Hilton Niagara Falls/Fallsview Hotel & Suites offers breathtaking views of Niagara Falls from The Watermark restaurant

title: Chad
body: The opening of Hilton N'Djamena marked Hilton's presence in 100 countries

title: Chile
body: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Santiago - Vitacura offers stunning Andes Mountain views

title: China
body: Long Bar at Waldorf Astoria Shanghai is a restored version of the once world’s longest bar, which measured 39 feet, and was carved out of raw mahogany

title: Colombia
body: The first South American Embassy Suites opened in Bogota in December 1995

title: Costa Rica
body: Doubletree Resort by Hilton Central Pacific is an all inclusive resort complete with 13 bars and restaurants

title: Croatia
body: Hilton Imperial Dubrovnik is a UNESCO World Heritage Site that offers stunning views over the medieval Old Town and Adriatic Sea

title: Curacao
body: Hilton Curacao features an on-site diving program to explore the coral cover which is higher in Curacao than other Caribbean islands

title: Cyprus
body: Hilton Cyprus is the only 5 star hotel in Nicosia

title: Czech Republic
body: Hilton Old Town Prague is located in the center of Prague’s most desirable attractions, including Old Town Square, Wenceslas Square and Charles Bridge

title: Denmark
body: Hilton Copenhagen Airport has been awarded the Green Key Certificate for Environmental Awareness

title: Dominican Republic
body: Embassy Suites by Hilton Santo Domingo is the tallest building in Santo Domingo, boasting incredible views over the Dominican Republic’s vibrant capital city

title: Ecuador
body: Hilton Colon Quito Hotel is ideally located in La Mariscal enternainment district, on Quito’s bustling Avenida Amazonas

title: Egypt
body: Hilton Pyramids Golf Resort, a relaxed hotel just outside of Cairo, boasts stunning views of the Pyramids

title: El Salvador
body: The Hilton Princess San Salvador is one of the tallest buildings in the country at 61 metres

title: Equatorial Guinea
body: Hilton Malabo was added in 2011 as Hilton's first property in Equatorial Guinea, in the same week that Hilton opened it's first property in Namibia

title: Ethiopia
body: Hilton Addis Ababa, which is inspired by the famous Lalibella Cross Church, has a geo-thermal outdoor swimming pool and an 18-hole mini golf course

title: Finland
body: The Hilton Helsinki Kalastajatorppa hotel overlooks the Gulf of Finland and often hosts meetings on the beach

title: France
body: Trianon Palace Versailles, Waldorf Astoria Hotel is walking distance of the legendary Palace of Versailles

title: French Polynesia
body: Hilton Bora Bora Nui Resort & Spa has its own private islet, which was once Polynesian Queen Pomare IV's private beach

title: Georgia
body: Hilton's first property in Georgia, Hilton Batumi which overlooks the Black Sea, will soon be joined by the Hilton Garden Inn Tbilisi Chavchavadze in the heart of the financial district

title: Germany
body: Freddy Mercury wrote "Crazy little thing called love" while in taking a bubble bath in a suite at Hilton Munich Park

title: Greece
body: Conrad Hilton attended the official opening of the Hilton Athens in 1963 which marked Athens' first international chain property

title: Guam
body: Hilton Guam Resort & Spa is situated on 32 acres of beachfront property with panoramic views of Tumon Bay

title: Guatemala
body: Located in the financial and business district, the Hilton Garden Inn Guatemala City has outdoor gardens to accomodate up to 250 guests

title: Honduras
body: The Mayan ruins of Copan and the beautiful beaches of the Bay of Cortes are a short drive away from the Hilton Princess San Pedro Sula

title: Hong Kong
body: The Conrad Hong Kong houses six restaurants and bars, including a cake shop, brasserie and Michelin-starred Cantonese restaurant

title: Hungary
body: Hilton Budapest is located in the Royal Castle District, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

title: Iceland
body: Hilton Reykjavik Nordica is conveniently set in the city centre and the first Canopy by Hilton is set to open nearby in 2016

title: India
body: Hilton Shillim Estate Retreat & Spa is an award-winning spa retreat with a Naturopathy specialist and nutritionist on site

title: Indonesia
body: Guests of the Conrad Bali can engage in an authentic ancient purification ritual, Balinese arts and crafts, and traditional dancing

title: Ireland
body: In 2013, DoubleTree by Hilton opened its first hotel in Ireland, The Morrison - a DoubleTree by Hilton (Dublin)

title: Israel
body: The Hilton Tel Aviv opened more than 50 years ago in 1963

title: Italy
body: Mr. and Mrs. Joel Franken from Davenport, Iowa were welcome as the first guests at the Hilton Grand Vacations Club at Borgo alle Vigne

title: Jamaica
body: Montego Bay's Hilton Rose Hall Resort & Spa is located on the legendary 18th-century Rose Hall Plantation

title: Japan
body: At the Hilton Odawara Resort & Spa, children ages 4-12 can test themselves to see if they have what it takes to be a Hilton Odawara Ninja

title: Jordan
body: Marvel at stunning Red Sea views from the edge of the infinity pool at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Aqaba

title: Kazakhstan
body: The modern Hilton Garden Inn Astana, Hilton's only hotel in the Kazakhstan, boasts easy access to the city center

title: Kenya
body: In addition to the Hilton Nairobi, a Hilton Garden Inn is scheduled to open near the Jomo Kenyatta International Airport

title: Kuwait
body: The largest fountain in Kuwait can be found at Al-Kout Mall, just five minutes from the Hilton Kuwait Resort

title: Lebanon
body: Hilton Beirut Habtoor Grand boasts the Middle East's first Snow Room

title: Luxembourg
body: The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Luxembourg is just ten minutes from the European Court of Justice and European Commission

title: Macao
body: The world’s largest Conrad hotel is located in Macao

title: Malaysia
body: Admire the tallest twin buildings in the world, Petronas Twin Towers, from DoubleTree by Hilton Kuala Lumpur

title: Maldives
body: Conrad Maldives Rangali Island features the world's first and only all glass undersea restaurant

title: Malta
body: Exchange your vows in full view of the deep azure of the Mediterranean Sea at Hilton Malta

title: Mauritius
body: Hilton Mauritius Resort offers a serene and invigorating getaway on the beautiful beaches of Flic en Flac

title: Mexico
body: In 2015 the Hilton Los Cabos Beach & Golf Resort reopened 10 months after being slammed by Hurricane Odile

title: Myanmar
body: With five properties in the works, Hilton Worldwide is committed to creating jobs and partnerships in Myanmar

title: Namibia
body: Watch the sunset from the Hilton Windhoek's rooftop bar with panoramic views of the Namibian skyline

title: Netherlands
body: In 1969, John Lennon and Yoko Ono honeymooned in a Presidential Suite at Hilton Amsterdam

title: New Caledonia
body: Hilton Noumea La Promenade Residences including a glass-walled chapel located in the gardens of the hotel with panoramic views over Anse Vata Bay

title: New Zealand
body: Stay at the Hilton Queenstown Resort and Spa to discover why this city earned the title, 'Adventure capital of the world'

title: Nicaragua
body: Take a trip to the near by Masaya's Volcano when staying at the Hilton Princess Managua

title: Nigeria
body: Each year Transcorp Hilton Abuja participates in the World Wide Fund's Earth Hour initiative by switching off non-essential lighting for one hour

title: Oman
body: With views of the Arabian Sea and dramatic Dhofar mountain range, Hilton Salalah Resort is the perfect place to relax and soak in the local culture

title: Panama
body: Hilton Panama is home to the first Ruth's Chris Steakhouse in Latin America

title: Peru
body: The Hilton Garden Inn Cusco is the perfect starting point to explore the archaeological capital of the Americas

title: Poland
body: The Hilton Gdansk is home to High 5 Terrace Bar, the highest bar in the Old Town with views of the Motlawa River

title: Portugal
body: DoubleTree by Hilton, Portugal donates extra food from their restaurant and events to over 40 disadvantaged families in their local community

title: Puerto Rico
body: The Piña Colada was invented at the Caribe Hilton in San Juan. Cheers!

title: Qatar
body: Hilton Doha works with The Youth Company, a large-scale youth engagement organization in Qatar, to provide leadership course training

title: Republic of Fiji
body: The Hilton Fiji Beach Resort & Spa boasts a beachfront location on 1.5 km of stunning private beach

title: Republic of Seychelles
body: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Seychelles Allamanda features the Duniye Spa, perched on a large granite boulder, overlooking the Indian Ocean

title: Romania
body: Built in 1914, the Athenee Palace Hilton Bucharest hotel is one of the city’s most sophisticated and prestigious landmarks

title: Russia
body: The Hilton Moscow Leningradskaya is listed as one of the historical monuments of Moscow

title: Saudi Arabia
body: Waldorf Astoria Jeddah - Qasr al Sharq has a three-story Swarovski crystal chandelier suspended from the lobby

title: Singapore
body: Hilton Singapore is consistently ranked highly for their lushious cheesecake

title: Slovakia
body: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bratislava is attached to Slovnaft Arena, where all KHL matches are played, as well as various concerts and performances

title: South Africa
body: Hilton Cape Town City Center partners with a youth accommodation center to provide donated hotel items to furnish rooms for homeless youth

title: South Korea
body: Spa treatments at the Hilton Namhae Golf and Spa Resort inspired by the ancient tradition of zimzilbang

title: Spain
body: In December 2012, DoubleTree by Hilton entered the Iberian Peninsula with DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Spa Emporda on Spain's Costa Brava

title: Sri Lanka
body: The Hilton Colombo is the only hotel in the city with a connective bridge to The World Trade Centre

title: Sweden
body: The Hilton Stockholm is a short walk from Grona Lund, a 130 year-old amusement park

title: Switzerland
body: Hilton Garden Inn Davos is located opposite Davos Congress Center – the host venue of the World Economic Forum every January

title: Tanzania
body: Every room in the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel - Dar es Salaam is decorated with traditional African arts and crafts

title: Thailand
body: DoubleTree Resort Thailand designed a hydroponics farm to teach students how to build and manage a hydroponic farmstead

title: Trinidad and Tobago
body: The unique entrance to Hilton Trinidad Hotel & Conference Centre is located on the top floor and an elevator descends to the guest rooms which have private balconies overlooking 25 acres of lanscaped gardens

title: Turkey
body: The first international Hilton hotel opened outside the United States was the Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus

title: Ukraine
body: Hilton Kyiv created an Annual Hospitality Innovation Competition for the students of the neighboring Kyiv Universities

title: United Arab Emirates
body: Conrad Dubai features the only indoor vehicle elevator in the UAE

title: United Kingdom
body: The James Bond film "Golden Eye" was filmed at the Langham Hotel

title: United States
body: In 1919, Hilton's first hotel opened in Cisco, Texas

title: Uruguay
body: The ruins of an 18th century Spanish fortress is a short distance away from the Conrad Punta del Este Resort and Casino

title: Venezuela
body: Embassy Suites by Hilton Caracas is close to Centro Sambil which is among the largest shopping malls in South America with over 500 stores

title: Vietnam
body: Hilton Garden Inn Hanoi hotel the brand's first hotel in Southeast Asia
